programmes.show_name: Asian Network's Shades On Mix with DJ Manara
programmes.show_description: Manara jumps on the decks for a brand new Shades On mix that marries underground heat and Desi geets. Contains strong language.

programmes.show_name: Asian Network's Shades On Mix with DJ Manara
programmes.show_description: DJ Manara goes in the mix for the ravers and garage lovers! Contains strong language.
AJD mixes Zack Knight, Tegi Pannu and a number from the film Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi before transitioning to Drake, Future and BombayMami. Plus, the All Star Anthems mix.
AJD starts with Byg Byrd and Sidhu Moose Wala before showcasing a triple threat of R&B inspired tracks from AR Paisley, Nivair Pannu and Nijjar. Plus new releases and throwbacks.
Celebrating the greatest artists and icons from South Asian music, film and pop culture. Asian Network Celebrates Indian singer and lyricist Palak Muchhal.

programmes.show_name: The Everyday Hustle with Harleen Nottay
programmes.show_description: To mark Valentine's Day, Harleen Nottay speaks to expert matchmaker Naseem Mohammed about her company and to find out what you should look out for when undertaking online dating.
2/4. Nadia is joined by star of Netflix's Dubai Bling, Ebraheem Al-Samadi who shares what Ramadan is like for him and how different it is in Dubai compared to Florida, where he grew up.
The biggest Certified Mashups from the likes of Jay Sean, Priya Ragu and Panjabi MC!

programmes.show_name: Asian Network Breakfast with Nikita Kanda
programmes.show_description: We hit the streets for Poll the People! Can you guess how the public answered? Ask your smart speaker to play BBC Asian Network.

programmes.show_name: Asian Network Certified with Nikita Kanda
programmes.show_description: Nikita Kanda spins the biggest certified anthems to make your day wherever you are.
Haroon is playing all the hottest tracks and pulls out a classic from The Vault. Can you guess what year he is going to choose?
Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor is being held by police, arrested on suspicion of misconduct in public office. He always denied doing anything wrong.
Haroon's dropping the week's biggest tunes along with plenty of laughter and chat. Wherever you're listening, Haroon's got the tunes to keep you company.
...Throwbacks with Haroon Rashid. Asian Network Certified Throwback bangers! Big anthems you haven't heard in ages!
Jaz is getting the party started early, kicking things off with a massive Love Friday Mix from DJ Shraii.
The latest news from around the UK and around the world.
AJD spins Badshah and Davido before mixing Arif Lohar, Sammy Virji and Zulekha plus throwbacks from the film Cocktail and a UKG flex from Imran Khan. Plus the All Star Anthems.
AJD brings one hour of unapologetically loud and proud Punjabi tunes starting with new Karan Aujla, Raf Saperra's dance collaboration and Panjabi MC with a bassline banger.
...Music Chart with Jasmine Takhar. Will Zayn's track Die For Me hold on to the top spot for the second week? Jasmine Takhar counts down your top 20 tracks according to sales, streams and downloads.
Ramnik Schools the Nation on A.S Kang and LL Cool Singh's Gidhyan Di Raniye (Loverman Mix). Contains strong language.
Ramnik is on the decks for this week's Love Friday Mix. Featuring the biggest R&B, hip-hop, Pakistani, Bhangra and Bollywood tracks guaranteed to get you ready for the weekend!
